Class: Dihydropyridine class of calcium channel blockers

Notes: Could be either Benzodiazepines or antipsychotics. The betas between Benzodiazepines and Antipsychotics are basically the same  (-0.3776 vs -0.3807) but the variance on the Benzodiazepines was higher (0.0211 vs 0.0059) and so chose to class these as Benzodiazepines to reflect greater uncertainty.

Medication: Other vitamins, minerals or herbal supp

Notes: Could be either Benzodiazepines or antipsychotics. The betas between Benzodiazepines and Antipsychotics are basically the same  (-0.3776 vs -0.3807) but the variance on the Benzodiazepines was higher (0.0211 vs 0.0059) and so chose to class these as Benzodiazepines to reflect greater uncertainty.
Note: Technically a Nonbenziodiazepine but apparently while these are molecularly different their outcomes and side effects are the same because they act on the same receptors.
